textBeforeTable: Dead Money DLC for Obsidian's action/RPG will eventually be coming to the PC and PlayStation 3 are accurate, he remained elusive: "I think we’ll probably just have to wait and see. I wouldn’t want to say anything more then [sic] that," he tells them. "Right now, it’s exclusive to 360. That’s the only place you can get it. I’m not going to comment on other platforms." VG247. "I don’t think we’ve ever had a product where we said, ‘Yeah, we’re just gonna do one DLC pack and that’s all she wrote.’ We like to support our products. We like to do a good job of that, and I don’t think putting out one DLC pack would reach that. I would say you can probably look for other stuff from us down the road." Target platforms are not mentioned, and when asked if presumptions that the Fallout: New Vegas is in the works.
